alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Glades County through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Lakeport, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeport, Buckhead Ridge, Brighton Seminole Reservation, and Indian Prairie Canal Mouth. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
